attributes.action: Take the FA cup and League cup semi finals from The new Wembley.
attributes.additional_details: Debate, put pressure on Wembley....start giving football back to the fans!
attributes.background: In 2007 we were told that semi finals would be played at the new Wembley to help fund the cost of the stadium. Well 15 years later I imagine the cost has been grabbed back, and some. Cup semi finals traditionally have always been played at neutral club grounds...we need to take this back!!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about where to hold football matches are a matter for their organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
